mainHero.title: Concordia
mainHero.subtitle: Biomedical Engineering Club.
mainHero.description: The  Biomedical Engineering Club is dedicated to fostering a community of aspiring biomedical engineers at Concordia University. Our mission is to explore innovative solutions that bridge engineering and healthcare, preparing members for careers in this dynamic field.

items.title: AI Dermatology Diagnostic Tool
items.description: A clinical decision-support system designed to assist healthcare professionals in making faster and more accurate preliminary dermatological diagnoses. This project combines a powerful visual analysis CNN with a symptom analysis engine to provide comprehensive, evidence-based differential diagnosis, covering over 320 conditions with CNN trained on 23 common visual classes.

items.title: Student Research Opportunities
items.description: Get involved in cutting-edge research projects with faculty mentors. Our club connects students with research opportunities in medical imaging, biosensors, rehabilitation engineering, and computational biology. Build your portfolio while contributing to meaningful healthcare innovations.

features.title: Our Goals
features.subtitle: Unlocking the Future of Biomedical Engineering!
features.description: At our Biomedical Engineering Club, we strive to foster an environment where innovation meets collaboration. Our mission is to empower members with the skills, resources, and connections necessary to excel in the field of biomedical engineering. Here‚Äôs how we aim to achieve our goals:

sections.name: Get Involved
sections.content: Whether you're interested in AI applications in medicine, medical device design, or healthcare data analysis, our club offers opportunities to learn, contribute, and make a real impact. We welcome students from all engineering disciplines and backgrounds.

sections.name: Partnership Opportunities
sections.content: Industry professionals and healthcare organizations interested in collaborating on student projects or providing mentorship opportunities are encouraged to reach out to us.

hero.title: Partner With Innovation
hero.subtitle: Join us in empowering the next generation of biomedical engineers at Concordia University

about.title: About Concordia Biomedical Engineering Club
about.description: The Concordia Biomedical Engineering Club is a student-run organization dedicated to bridging the gap between engineering innovation and healthcare solutions. Our mission is to foster innovation, collaboration, and professional development among aspiring biomedical engineers.
about.mission: Our mission is to foster innovation, collaboration, and professional development in the field of biomedical engineering, preparing our members for successful careers in healthcare technology.
about.activities: We organize workshops, industry talks, networking events, design competitions, and hands-on projects that give students real-world experience in medical device development, healthcare data analysis, and biomedical research.
about.impact: Our members go on to work at leading medical device companies, research institutions, and healthcare technology startups, making meaningful contributions to improving patient care and advancing medical technology.
